title: TEST Flora Annual Fall Festival Dates Announced
full_story: The town council has confirmed the dates for this year's festival, featuring new local vendors.

title: TEST Louisville High School Basketball Update
full_story: The varsity team secures a home-court victory in the regional qualifiers.

title: COUNTY FAIR QUEEN PAGEANT
full_story: 1/2/26 The 2026 Miss Illinois County Fair Queen Pageant will be held on Saturday, January 17th and Sunday the 18th in Springfield. Clay County Fair Queen Olivia Haun will be honored at a sendoff party at the State Bank Suites Sunday from 1 to 3 pm...

title: GROCERY TAX GONE?
full_story: In Clay County, Flora, Louisville and Clay City have all passed a 1% grocery tax...

title: UPCOMING ACTIVITIES
full_story: (BIBLE GROVE) It’s the next scheduled Gym Bob’s Jamboree Show... (SAILOR SPRINGS) The Clay City/Sailor Springs American Legion Post 230 will have another first Saturday of the month breakfast...
